programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Meets Lucky / Paddington and the Love Day Cards) S1 (11/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Meets Lucky / Paddington and the Love Day Cards»Paddington meets Mateo's dog Lucky! Paddington tries to teach him tricks, but Lucky will not behave. It's Love Day in Windsor Gardens! // Paddington is on a mission to deliver Love Day cards to all his friends.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's First Chinese New Year / Paddington and the Missing Tickets) S1 (15/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington's First Chinese New Year / Paddington and the Missing Tickets»Ms. Potts is missing home, so Paddington decides to hold a surprise Chinese New Year Party. // Mr. Brown is taking the kids to the Circus tonight but where are the tickets? Paddington and the kids must retrace his steps to find them.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et le football) S1 (5/54)
programme.desc: «Paddington et le football»Jonathan teaches Paddington football, but Paddington kicks the ball into Mr. Curry's garden. They decide to get it back by climbing over the fence.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Papa fait de l'exercice) S1 (42/52)
programme.desc: «Papa fait de l'exercice»Peppa instructs Daddy Pig to do lots of exercise to do as he is a bit fat. Daddy Pig is horrified to learn you have to exercise every day to get fit.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le rangement) S1 (43/52)
programme.desc: «Le rangement»Peppa and George have to tidy their bedroom. After a frenzy of cleaning, the room is tidy. The room doesn't stay tidy for long though.

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Brumezilla) S5 (n°20)
programme.desc: «Brumezilla»It's Lighthouse Keeper Deema's birthday! But when a monster named Fogzilla keeps blowing out her lighthouse, she needs to figure out how to get Captain Molly's ship, carrying her birthday cake, to shore, or there won't be a party!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Viens rire avec Blue !) S1 (7/17)
programme.desc: «Viens rire avec Blue !»Josh is being silly but still can't get Blue to laugh! We play Blue's Clues to figure out what will make Blue laugh. While we look for clues we find patterns with a goofy gopher and locate all the mixed-up things in Silly Town.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La chanson de Blue) S1 (8/17)
programme.desc: «La chanson de Blue»Josh wants to find out which song Blue would like to sing and of course Blue's Clues offers a solution.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Les épreuves du pirate protecteur) S2 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Les épreuves du pirate protecteur»On the first anniversary of becoming Pirate Protector, Santiago must complete a series of challenges meant to test his abilities and prove he's worthy all without the help of his tools or best mateys.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (The Golden Giant) S1 (n°3)
programme.desc: «The Golden Giant»When Enrique awakens a giant, Santi and crew must find a way to save the day.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Flow Bros) S1 (n°21)
programme.desc: «Flow Bros»When Chucks leads a precious bubble across the ocean, the typically carefree seahorse learns the importance of watching where you flow.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Buds at First Bite) S1 (25/28)
programme.desc: «Buds at First Bite»When Baby's new neighbor doesn't like him, Baby pulls out all the stops to change his mind.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Bread) S1 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Bread»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Une pluie de nourriture / La grande roue) S4 (8/26)
programme.desc: «Une pluie de nourriture / La grande roue»Mr. Porter's delivery drones have gone out of control, and now they are air-dropping food everywhere! // Mayor Humdinger steals Adventure Bay's Ferris Wheel.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et la fête de madame Bird) S2 (4/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington et la fête de madame Bird»It's Mrs. Bird Day & Paddington wants to make a cake with a Special jar of Marmalade but no one can open it - how will he show his appreciation?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Polly le perroquet) S1 (4/52)
programme.desc: «Polly le perroquet»George's favourite toy is Mr.Dinosaur. One day Mr.Dinosaur gets stuck up a tree and George thinks he is lost, so Peppa helps George find him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Cache-cache) S1 (5/52)
programme.desc: «Cache-cache»Peppa and George play hide and seek.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La halte-garderie) S1 (6/52)
programme.desc: «La halte-garderie»Peppa and George are going to daycare. It's George's first day at daycare, and he shows the class his interest in dinosaurs.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Ron's Sunburn) S1 (n°55)
programme.desc: «Ron's Sunburn»Ron has gotten a terrible sunburn and is too embarrassed to come outside and play with his friends. They try everything they can think of to get him to play with them. They even try tempting him with Froga's freshly baked cookies!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Le portrait de Bubu) S1 (56/78)
programme.desc: «Le portrait de Bubu»Anna is painting a beautiful portrait of Bubu as a surprise gift. As she is missing a colour, she leaves the painting in the meadow for a moment. Meanwhile, Christopher arrives and finds the abandoned painting, he decides to take it to Bubu's.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue's Treasure of the Clue Lagoon) S3 (n°19)
programme.desc: «Blue's Treasure of the Clue Lagoon»Come on a beach adventure to Rainbow Cove with Blue, Josh and Rainbow Puppy! According to legend, there's a fantastic hidden treasure, and Rainbow Puppy wants Josh and Blue's help finding it.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La pierre de l'espace / Le maire adjoint) S4 (17/26)
programme.desc: «La pierre de l'espace / Le maire adjoint»Everest, the Turbots and a Space Rock get trapped in a cave. // Mayor Goodway goes missing and Mayor Humdinger causes havoc in Adventure Bay.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Les trois petits cochons) S3 (9/26)
programme.desc: «Les trois petits cochons»The Paw Patrol help three little pigs build new houses after theirs mysteriously disappear.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Les mini héros / Un visage dans l'espace) S2 (n°214)
programme.desc: «Les mini héros / Un visage dans l'espace»When the younger animals in the forest want to be like their heroes Deer Squad, things don't go as planned as Sir Steel steps in. // The Deer Squad have to save the day in Space when Sir Steel's plan to project his face on the moon goes wrong!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (L'Échangeur / Touche pas à mon oeuf) S1 (n°9)
programme.desc: «L'Échangeur / Touche pas à mon oeuf»Professor Scratch's Switcheroo device causes chaos when Sir Steel uses it to get Deer Squad's Powers. // Rammy must learn to trust his friends when he chooses to take care of an abandoned egg, all while dealing with a mysterious ant invasion.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and a Runaway Gerbils / Paddington Wins Ranger Badge) S1 (12/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and a Runaway Gerbils / Paddington Wins Ranger Badge»Paddington accidentally releases the school pet Gerbil that Judy is looking after. Paddington and Judy search for it in the house and in Mr. Curry's garden. // Jonathan and Paddington must get their Ranger badges but Mr. Curry is not happy with them.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Bread) S1 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Bread»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle) S1 (6/52)
programme.desc: «It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle»Taking after his favourite detective, Barbabravo looks for a case to solve. Can he solve the mystery of the missing ice statue? // Inspired by their favourite heroes, the Barbababies make costumes. But no heroes are possible without villains...

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Hiccupism / Silence please) S1 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Hiccupism / Silence please»Barbabeau can't paint. He has a hiccup he can't get rid of. Just when he's about to give up, he accidentally creates a new artistic movement. // Barbalib wants to compete in a writing contest but his brothers and sisters stop her from concentrating.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Captain Varech / Riquiqui le Tardigrade) S1 (n°9)
programme.desc: «Captain Varech / Riquiqui le Tardigrade»As Super Shark and Captain Kelp, Baby Shark and William set out to save playtime-but is Captain Kelp just a sidekick? // Baby Shark adopts a teensy tiny pet, but is he ready for a big responsibility?

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (The Best Friends Game) S1 (n°26)
programme.desc: «The Best Friends Game»When Vigo and Costello enter a gameshow to win an evil prize, Super Shark and Captain Kelp sign up to stop them on live TV.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Trip to the Moon) S1 (n°25)
programme.desc: «The Trip to the Moon»Christopher dreams to visit the moon so his friends make his wish come true. Bubu makes a rocket ship in cardboard and the friends make Christopher an outfit with everything he will need during the trip to the moon.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Swing) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «The Swing»When Anna and Froga discover the old seat of their swing, they are excited to hang it on the apple tree. But the ropes to attach it have gone missing!The two friends' search for the missing ropes turns out to be more difficult than they had imagined!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Magic Trick) S1 (n°57)
programme.desc: «The Magic Trick»Anna and Christopher are amazed by Ron's magic trick! When Ron teaches Anna how to be a magician, she wants to make Christopher disappear! Christopher is transformed into a balloon and the balloon into Froga!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Go Find it!) S1 (n°58)
programme.desc: «Go Find it!»Today, Christopher organises the game of the day. He lists objects that his friends must bring back, the 1st team who does, win the game. But the objects are not easy to gather: the sun, a rocket ship, or a house!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Fruits Surprise) S1 (n°70)
programme.desc: «Fruits Surprise»When Froga and Christopher realize that Anna and Bubu may be making a "fruit surprises" for Snack Time, they try everything they can to preserve the two surprises. Froga and Christopher realized how difficult preserving a surprise can be!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Bubu's New Blue Jeans) S1 (n°71)
programme.desc: «Bubu's New Blue Jeans»Christopher has prepared his annual obstacle race and is excited for all the friends to participate. Bubu's new blue jeans are still drying so he has to wear his brand-new pair to the event, he becomes overly concerned of getting them dirty.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Maman Pig travaille) S1 (7/52)
programme.desc: «Maman Pig travaille»Peppa accidentally crashes Mama Pig's computer. Papa Pig is trying to get it right.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le cochon du milieu) S1 (8/52)
programme.desc: «Le cochon du milieu»Peppa loses her tooth, so she puts the tooth under the pillow for the Tooth Fairy, but she worries that she might be mean.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La boîte à secrets) S1 (13/52)
programme.desc: «La boîte à secrets»Peppa and her friends take part in a school play about Little Red Riding Hood, but Pedro Pony is nervous to be on the stage.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le cerf-volant) S1 (14/52)
programme.desc: «Le cerf-volant»Peppa and George are going to daycare. It's George's first day at daycare, and he shows the class his interest in dinosaurs.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Boris / Né pour être sauvage) S1 (3/52)
programme.desc: «Boris / Né pour être sauvage»The barbababies find a lost baby elephant and secretly look after it. How will Barbapapa and Barbamama react to Boris? // Boris the elephant misses home. The Barbapapa decide to bring him back to Africa. On the spot, they help Boris to acclimatize.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Let Justice Be Done / The Great Spring Clean) S1 (9/52)
programme.desc: «Let Justice Be Done / The Great Spring Clean»Barbabeau forgot to return his book to the library. As Mr Strict the librarian is visiting Barbapapa today, Barbabeau decides to run away. // Barbamama wants the barbababies to tidy their bedrooms. They're hiding to escape the drudgery.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Les Héros du baby-sitting) S5 (4/20)
programme.desc: «Les Héros du baby-sitting»Blaze and his driver AJ are best friends. They arrive in Axle City where Crusher wants to win the race for the world championship by cheating. Blaze and AJ do everything they can to stop and defeat Crusher.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Gâteau-strophe !) S1 (11/20)
programme.desc: «Gâteau-strophe !»"When a hungry Crusher accidentally turns the baker truck's baker bots to messy mode, they sprout wheels and drive away! It's up to AJ and Blaze to track down all the rampaging robots before Axle City is blanketed in baked goods.".

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le Ballon dirigeable / Le Concours du Meilleur Chili) S4 (1/26)
programme.desc: «Le Ballon dirigeable / Le Concours du Meilleur Chili»Capn' Turbot's weather blimp is taken by Mayor Humdinger who plans ot use it to change the weather in Foggy Bottom. // Mr. Porter's stove explodes right before the Chilli cook-off.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La partie de cache-cache / Des bébêtes en vadrouille) S4 (3/26)
programme.desc: «La partie de cache-cache / Des bébêtes en vadrouille»The dragon from Alex's favourite book comes to life and plays hide and seek in Adventure Bay. Alex can help get him back. Francois's trailer detaches and all of his reptiles and amphibians escape from their cage.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La Tour de l'espace / C'est magique) S1 (n°10)
programme.desc: «La Tour de l'espace / C'est magique»Mr. Steel wants to go to the moon and orders Professor Sketch to turn the Steel Tower into a rocket! A magician lures the audience away from Rammy's presentation, who gets so angry that he takes it out on the man's hat.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Lights, Camera, Action!) S2 (n°3)
programme.desc: «Lights, Camera, Action!»Lights, Camera, Action!: The Deer Squad must think fast to save Lady Fluffpot when Sir Steel's filming turns into a disaster movie! (S2, ep 3b).

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Meets Lucky / Paddington and the Love Day Cards) S1 (11/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Meets Lucky / Paddington and the Love Day Cards»Paddington meets Mateo's dog Lucky! Paddington tries to teach him tricks, but Lucky will not behave. It's Love Day in Windsor Gardens! // Paddington is on a mission to deliver Love Day cards to all his friends.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's First Chinese New Year / Paddington and the Missing Tickets) S1 (15/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington's First Chinese New Year / Paddington and the Missing Tickets»Ms. Potts is missing home, so Paddington decides to hold a surprise Chinese New Year Party. // Mr. Brown is taking the kids to the Circus tonight but where are the tickets? Paddington and the kids must retrace his steps to find them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Une chaude journée) S1 (40/52)
programme.desc: «Une chaude journée»It is a super hot day, and all the mud puddles have dried up, so Peppa and George play in the wading pool.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les marionnettes de Chloé) S1 (41/52)
programme.desc: «Les marionnettes de Chloé»Peppa and George visit their cousin Chloe's house, where they put on a puppet show about a pig who snores a lot. Daddy Pig and Uncle Pig miss the show as they are too busy snoring.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Papa fait de l'exercice) S1 (42/52)
programme.desc: «Papa fait de l'exercice»Peppa instructs Daddy Pig to do lots of exercise to do as he is a bit fat. Daddy Pig is horrified to learn you have to exercise every day to get fit.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le rangement) S1 (43/52)
programme.desc: «Le rangement»Peppa and George have to tidy their bedroom. After a frenzy of cleaning, the room is tidy. The room doesn't stay tidy for long though.

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Brumezilla) S5 (n°20)
programme.desc: «Brumezilla»It's Lighthouse Keeper Deema's birthday! But when a monster named Fogzilla keeps blowing out her lighthouse, she needs to figure out how to get Captain Molly's ship, carrying her birthday cake, to shore, or there won't be a party!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Viens rire avec Blue !) S1 (7/17)
programme.desc: «Viens rire avec Blue !»Josh is being silly but still can't get Blue to laugh! We play Blue's Clues to figure out what will make Blue laugh. While we look for clues we find patterns with a goofy gopher and locate all the mixed-up things in Silly Town.

programme.desc: «La chanson de Blue»Josh wants to find out which song Blue would like to sing and of course Blue's Clues offers a solution.

programme.desc: «Les épreuves du pirate protecteur»On the first anniversary of becoming Pirate Protector, Santiago must complete a series of challenges meant to test his abilities and prove he's worthy all without the help of his tools or best mateys.

programme.desc: «The Golden Giant»When Enrique awakens a giant, Santi and crew must find a way to save the day.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Flow Bros) S1 (n°21)
programme.desc: «Flow Bros»When Chucks leads a precious bubble across the ocean, the typically carefree seahorse learns the importance of watching where you flow.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Buds at First Bite) S1 (25/28)
programme.desc: «Buds at First Bite»When Baby's new neighbor doesn't like him, Baby pulls out all the stops to change his mind.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Bread) S1 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Bread»Tiny Chef bakes bread but forgets to watch his rising dough and needs to think fast when the dough grows too big!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Une pluie de nourriture / La grande roue) S4 (8/26)
programme.desc: «Une pluie de nourriture / La grande roue»Mr. Porter's delivery drones have gone out of control, and now they are air-dropping food everywhere! // Mayor Humdinger steals Adventure Bay's Ferris Wheel.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et la fête de madame Bird) S2 (4/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington et la fête de madame Bird»It's Mrs. Bird Day & Paddington wants to make a cake with a Special jar of Marmalade but no one can open it - how will he show his appreciation?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le pique-nique) S1 (15/52)
programme.desc: «Le pique-nique»Peppa and her family go for a picnic. Daddy Pig falls asleep after eating so much, but then gets some exercise being chased by a wasp!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les instruments de musique) S1 (16/52)
programme.desc: «Les instruments de musique»Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig find a box of instruments in the attic, and Peppa and George try them out.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Grenouilles, vers et papillons) S1 (17/52)
programme.desc: «Grenouilles, vers et papillons»Peppa and George find frogs, worms and butterflies in Grandma Pig and Grandpa Pig's garden and they play with them.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Stay Over) S1 (n°59)
programme.desc: «The Stay Over»When Anna and Froga invite Ron to take a nap on their couch, they are surprised by his loud snores. They try everything they can to get him to stop (without disturbing his nap) and when they try to get Bubu's help, but Ron snores louder and louder!!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Snow Dream) S1 (n°60)
programme.desc: «Snow Dream»Bubu has fixed Froga's barometer and everyone is surprised when it says there will be snow today (on a warm summer day!). Everyone is excited, Bubu wants to make to make a five-seater sled! He gets upset, when they realize it was a false forecast!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Greedyguts / Where is Bali?) S1 (n°21)
programme.desc: «Greedyguts / Where is Bali?»Bali is nowhere to be found, and the Barbapapa deploy all their imagination to look for her. They have no idea that a nice surprise awaits them!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La visite de Magenta) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «La visite de Magenta»Blue's friend Magenta is coming over today! We play Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to do with Magenta. During our search for clues, we identify opposites and check out animal footprint with our friends Shovel & Pail.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Une balade en raquettes / L'étang aux canards) S5 (12/26)
programme.desc: «Une balade en raquettes / L'étang aux canards»When Mayor Goodway and the twins are late getting back from a snowshoeing, Jake and Everest call the Paw Patrol to search for them.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Le parc au trésor / À pas de géant) S2 (n°215)
programme.desc: «Le parc au trésor / À pas de géant»When Bobbi and Jade find an underground cavern, they end up in danger when Sir Steel goes treasure hunting! // Rammy is so focused on meditation that he fails to focus on a REAL crisis!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Les Super Clones / Mise en boîte) S1 (n°11)
programme.desc: «Les Super Clones / Mise en boîte»In order to win the Citizen of the Year, Sir Steel and Professor Scratch create holograms doubles of Deer Squad who cause chaos all around. // It's Recycling Day and Sir Steel puts the whole town in cardboard boxes with his Box-ooka device.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Meets a Police Officer / Paddington and the Balloons) S1 (26/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Meets a Police Officer / Paddington and the Balloons»Jonathan has lost his balloon, Paddington tries to get him a new one but accidentally ends up flying all over London. // After a neighborhood watch talk Paddington decides to go on patrol as an unofficial policeman. Soon he has to solve a real crime.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Pizza) S1 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Pizza»Tiny Chef makes pizza and learns that friendship is more important than toppings when Ruby eats all the basil!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (L'herbe est toujours plus verte ailleurs / Quand je serai grand) S1 (n°11)
programme.desc: «L'herbe est toujours plus verte ailleurs / Quand je serai grand»Barbabright coats the house in magic product to prevent water leakage. The next day, The house deflates like a balloon. // A bird builds its nest on Barbazoo's belly. Barbazoo wants to become a big tree to shelter animals. This becomes complicated.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Perfect Dinner / The Kittens) S1 (n°13)
programme.desc: «The Perfect Dinner / The Kittens»Barbapapa and Barbamama go out to celebrate their birthdays. Barbabelle is in charge and gets overwhelmed. // Barbabelle watches Bali's kittens. She's scared something will happen and won't let them out. Barbamama must intervene to help the kittens.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Il était une fois dans l'eau / Le monstre gluant) S1 (n°13)
programme.desc: «Il était une fois dans l'eau / Le monstre gluant»When an underwater storm rains on Baby Shark and William's fun, they doubt whether they can have an adventure indoors. // William and Vola enter a Young Scientist Contest and their competitive spirit gets them into a sticky situation.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Amis pour la vie / La Poulpicelle) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Amis pour la vie / La Poulpicelle»When Baby Shark and friends enter a battle of the bands, Baby's rivalry with Shadow gets heated.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Spider) S1 (n°26)
programme.desc: «The Spider»Anna and Froga are completely freaked out when they learn a spider lives in Ron's treehouse with him! Ron tries his best to convince his friends that the spider is harmless.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Photo) S1 (n°5)
programme.desc: «The Photo»Polaroid camera, she decides to take pictures of all her friends. Everyone thinks it's a great idea and Anna makes some great portraits. But things get complicated when she tries to take a group shot of everyone!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Echange de rôles) S1 (63/78)
programme.desc: «Echange de rôles»When Froga and Anna realize they have switched mugs in the morning, they decide to make a day out of it and Switcheroo Day is born. Reversing roles, Froga will prepare lunch while Anna tends to Froga's strawberry plants.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Missing Socks) S1 (n°64)
programme.desc: «The Missing Socks»When Froga realizes her socks are smelly after a day of gardening, Bubu offers to help by placing them into his SMELL BETTER MACHINE. When the machine ends one of Froga's beloved socks has disappeared. She's worried it's gone forever.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Everywhere at Once) S1 (n°72)
programme.desc: «Everywhere at Once»Anna has prepared her ice cream for everyone but forgets to place it in the freezer. - as she is trying to help all her friends at once, the ice cream melts! Is it ruined or can it be saved?

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Blue Butterfly) S1 (n°73)
programme.desc: «The Blue Butterfly»Anna and her friends are on a mission to capture a photograph of a pretty flower, but on the search, they see a beautiful blue butterfly. The friends finally discover the best way to capture their enchanting photo.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'anniversaire de maman Pig) S1 (21/52)
programme.desc: «L'anniversaire de maman Pig»It is Mummy Pig's birthday, and Peppa, George and Daddy Pig are planning a surprise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fée dents de lait) S1 (22/52)
programme.desc: «La fée dents de lait»Peppa's tooth has come out, so she puts it under her pillow for the Tooth Fairy. But Peppa fears she might be malicious.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le pique-nique) S1 (15/52)
programme.desc: «Le pique-nique»Peppa and her family go for a picnic. Daddy Pig falls asleep after eating so much, but then gets some exercise being chased by a wasp!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les instruments de musique) S1 (16/52)
programme.desc: «Les instruments de musique»Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig find a box of instruments in the attic, and Peppa and George try them out.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Making Bread / From One Pit to Another) S1 (4/52)
programme.desc: «Making Bread / From One Pit to Another»Barbapapa wants to teach his children to make bread, but things don't go as planned...

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Même pas cap ! / Roy) S1 (10/52)
programme.desc: «Même pas cap ! / Roy»On a ski trip, the Barbapapas build a giant igloo. Barbabravo and Barbalib challenge each other to find out who is braver.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Jouets turbulents !) S5 (6/20)
programme.desc: «Jouets turbulents !»Blaze and Watts go with AJ and Gabby to their favorite store: a toy store. There they discover a machine that makes toys. The toy machine has a red button that you cannot press. And what does Crusher do?

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Une fusée incontrôlable) S1 (19/20)
programme.desc: «Une fusée incontrôlable»"When Crusher tries to cheat at a carnival game, he accidentally strands himself and Pickle on a giant rocket! Now it's up to Blaze and AJ to rescue the two trucks before their runaway rocket crashes into the garbage dump.".

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve la Limande / La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve un narval) S4 (22/26)
programme.desc: «La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve la Limande / La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve un narval»Cap'n Turbot's boat gets frozen in the Arctic Ice. // The pups use the Sea Patroller to help guide a lost narwhal back home.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La relique en or / Le Vroum-mobile) S5 (2/26)
programme.desc: «La relique en or / Le Vroum-mobile»When an ancient relic goes missing from Carlos' archeological dig, Tracker and Skye must track down the creature that may have taken it.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Les Nuages de couleur / La grande course) S1 (n°12)
programme.desc: «Les Nuages de couleur / La grande course»Sir Steel is upset with Lola's sky art as it affects the popularity of his hat stand, so he tries to disperse her artwork. // The Deer Squad have a race to see whose cart is the fastest, but Sir Steel unexpectedly join in with his Steelmobile!
